text: Sequel Is A Piece of Bullshit!!
Jeff Goldblum was great.  Some humor but nothing special

Filme fraco, o roteiro é fraco, as cenas são fracas, a história é fraca, o elenco é fraco, e ninguém ajuda a melhorar o filme, os personagens são fracos, e o filme deveria ter cenas bem melhores e relevantes, para fazer o filme ser bom
Not really a great way to expand the boss baby universe but it is at the same time
Once again, overhated! Why does everyone hate this movie? Its a good sequel!
This movie was great! I forgot how good it is!!!!

The Boss Baby 2 tries to make a silly and cute story but ends up becoming a generic version of the first one.
Horrible worst movie in the world
Adventures galore. Exceptional franchise.
We don't need anything like this. Why does this even exist?
This movie was pretty funny but very cringy, but I found the part where the grown man shot a baby out of his 🍑…….yea

Though it remains harmless, The Boss Baby: Family Business only improves on the fact that The Boss Baby had the opportunity to be a decent franchise, but it was sold out by cheap jokes in favor of plot.
malísima, muy infantil y con un terrible villano.

Good movie! My favourite character is Baby Tina. My least favourite character is The Professor. My favourite part is when Baby Tina says "Why don't ya both suck it". My least favourite part is when they sing the song with Marcos and Tabitha in Tabitha's room.
How the Boss Baby 2 has a higher audience score than the Boy and the Heron, Kung Fu Panda and Wallace & Gromit, the Curse of the Were-rabbit is genuinely impossible for me to comprehend
This is why Jesus left us
